navbar.navbarTopTitle: Sign up and get 20% off to your first order.

hero.heroTitle: FIND CLOTHES THAT MATCHES YOUR STYLE
hero.heroDescription: Browse through our diverse range of meticulously crafted  garments, designed to bring out your individuality and cater to your sense of style.

footer.formTitle: STAY UPTO DATE ABOUT OUR LATEST OFFERS
footer.title: We have clothes that suits your style and which you’re proud to wear. From women to men.

productDetail.faq2Answer: Shipping times vary depending on your location. Generally, orders are processed within 2-3 business days and delivery takes 5-7 business days for domestic shipments and 10-15 business days for international shipments.
productDetail.faq3Answer: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive an email with a tracking number and a link to track your package. You can also track your order by logging into your account on our website and viewing your order history.
productDetail.faq4Answer: Generally, orders are processed within 2-3 business days and delivery takesShipping costs vary depending on your location. Generally, orders are processed within 2-3 business days and delivery takes
productDetail.faq3: How can I track my order?
productDetail.faq1Answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all our products. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return it within 30 days for a full refund or exchange, provided the item is in its original condition.
